description: uhhhhhh this is fluid simulation yes
onLoad:
new Array(10000).fill().forEach((_,i) => level.actors['target'+(i+100)] = {like:'target1', pos:[Math.random(), Math.random()]}); 
 (async function() { const at=null;  await api.window(` W H A T `, at, 4);  await api.window(`I have no idea what's happening.`, at, 4);  await api.window(`Hey, can you explain? Like, anything?`, at, 4);  await api.window(`What is this?`, at, 2);  await api.window(`Is it real?`, at, 2);  await api.window(`Is any of this real?`, at, 2);  await api.window(`Is magic really real?`, at, 4);  await api.window(`Maybe this is a dream.`, at, 2);  await api.window(`But it's consistent, novel, and detailed.
So is it a dream, or merely alien?`, at, 4);  await api.window(`Eh, dreams are training for reality anyway.
It's all the same.`, at, 8);  await api.window(`I'll probably find out more if I keep living.`, at, 4) })()
onWon:
(async function() { const at=null;  api.levelSuggest('levels/x2/1.json');  await api.window(`Ah. You're done.`, at, 4);  await api.window(`Anyway, can you hold off on any more, spiritual ascension, in the near future?
Assuming that I can count on ya. Can I?`, at, 12);  api.levelLoad('levels/x2/1.json') })()
onLost: api.window([`(A rejected future.)`, `(Rejected.)`, `(A useless future.)`, `(No. Retry.)`, `(Unless you succeed, you cannot continue.)`, `(No. Rebirth in the past.)`, `(No, this step is necessary, trust me.)`, `(Understand the enemy to make its strength your own.)`, `(Knowledge absorption is not trivial, though not any less trivial than being determined. Be so.)`, `(You'll get it eventually.)`][Math.random()*10|0], 'pointer1');  setTimeout(api.levelLoad, 3000)
